title: Salmon fish cakes
ingredients: ['500g (1lb 2oz) potatoes, peeled and cubed', '250g (9oz) swede, peeled and cubed', '350g (12oz) salmon fillets', '2 tablespoons chopped onion', '2 tablespoons chopped carrot', '1 tablespoon chopped celery', '1 bay leaf', '½ teaspoon mustard seeds', '300ml (½ pint) skimmed milk', '1 tablespoon finely chopped chives', '2-3 drops of Worcestershire sauce', 'Salt and black pepper', '1 egg', '115g (4oz) fresh white breadcrumbs', 'Vegetable or olive oil for brushing']
